title: Color Rush
description: Color rush is an awesome, addictive, intensely challenging, mind blowing, brain busting, simple yet amazing game.

title: MineRush
description: Minerush is an Educational Game aiming to help students to enjoy playing while learning integers.

title: The Bitcoin Blockchain
description: An interactive application, demonstrates how the technologies behind bitcoin work together to accomplish decentralization.

title: Vortex Dwyte Voting System
description: A Capstone Project for facilitating the student supreme government elections. (Co-developed with carljustinemosquida)

title: CoinMarketSignals
description: CoinMarketSignals is a data platform of cryptocurrencies and what the popular technical indicators tell about them.

title: VaultSafe
description: Glorified TodoApp with encryption techniques I developed while learning ReactJS hooks.

title: CipherChat
description: An end-to-end encrypted instant messaging app built with MERN Stack. The app uses RSA assymetric encryption.

title: Bitcoin Ticker
description: A system tray application for linux that shows bitcoin's current USD price, and updates ever 3 seconds.

title: Mexbot
description: A discord bot connected to the Bitmex's WebSocket API that shows large-quantity trades in real-time

title: Fx Calendar Bot
description: A discord bot that shows weekly, daily, and upcoming news on the forex factory calendar. Alerts on telegram as well.

title: Moon Bot
description: A discord bot that shows real time moon phases and how much time left before the next full moon.
